m_szDocSumamry: India Throws More Support behind Clean Energy March 28th, 2012 by Zachary Shahan     India’s looking to further boost its economy with clean energy subsidies and tax breaks, its latest budget indicates. Later this year, the nation is expected to launch its 12th five-year plan.
